sentences.sContent: Even take the word burgher or bourgeois.
sentences.sContent_eng: Even take the word burgher or bourgeois.
sentences.sCn: 比如说"市民"或称之为"布尔乔亚"

sentences.sContent: The market square, flanked by the colourful gables of burgher houses, is probably the definitive site of the area.
sentences.sContent_eng: The market square, flanked by the colourful gables of burgher houses, is probably the definitive site of the area.
sentences.sCn: 集市广场的两侧是色彩鲜艳的尖顶民居，这里应该是老城区的中心地带了。

synos.tran: 市民（现主要指某些欧洲国家中产阶级的市民或镇民）；公民

words.tran: （英）自由民；市民；议员；（美）镇行政官

trans.tranOther: someone who lives in a particular town
